creator: suchko.pm@mellon.com
text: It is impossible to override the setter for the DIR attribute of the FileSet type.  The setter function is never invoked by ANT.

Created attachment 23198
custom typedef

Compile the custom type and run the build.xml file.

You will notice that output from the setDir method is never invoked.

Shouldn't the subclass be able to override the handling of this attribute.
creator: suchko.pm@mellon.com

text:
FileSet's has two setDir method accepts a File argument, not a String.

setters using String arguments are always of lower precedence than more advanced ones for Ant - see the paragraph below the bullted list in http://ant.apache.org/manual/develop.html#set-magic

You want to override the File-arg version instead of adding your own setter and it will work.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
